string-array.name: onboard_welcome
string-array.item: Thanks for downloading O2 Running Log. This app brings fresh air into drudgery of tracking your runs. Press next to progress through the tutorial or skip if you want to start using the app.

string-array.name: onboard_home
string-array.item: Here you see your all-time total, monthly trend, and mileage over a specific period. You can set that specific period to be the current week or current month. From here you can either press enter run to go to the run entry form or the calendar icon to view the calendar.

string-array.name: onboard_run_form
string-array.item: Here you can enter all the information you want about your run. The only thing you must enter for a run to be saved successfully is a distance or a time.

string-array.name: onboard_calendar
string-array.item: You can either select a previous run or create a new run if you forgot to log an earlier day!
